data.actual_result: Upload hangs, does not resume Settings: iPhone 6s Plus,  iOS 10.1.1 Latest Testflight 1.7.8 (43)
data.short_description: Upload fails to resume on network connection change
data.steps_to_repro: - 1) Start upload and interupt the connection - 2)Restore the connection or provide alternative (Wifi connection is lost and celluar takes its place)
